some racial comments towards them.
And I wrote this song as a reflection of that, and it's about a boy who was obviously
going through this and he just felt quite isolated and lonely, and like he couldn't talk to anyone.
And halfway through a match, his coach realized that he was dealing with these issues.
And it's just about how that whole situation came about and how he triumphed and came through it.
